Verses: 1 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhu, Uyirodirukkum Naalellaam, Neeyum Un Kumaaranum Un Kumaaraththiyum, Naan Unakku Vidhikkira Avarudaiya Ellaak Karpanaigalaiyum Kattalaigalaiyum Kaikkollugiradhinaale Un Vaazhnaatkal Neediththirukkumbadi,
2 neengal Sudhandharikkappogira Dhesaththile Kaikkollavadharkaaga, Ungalukkup Podhikkavendum Endru Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Karpiththa Karpanaigalum Kattalaigalum Niyaayangalum Ivaigale.

3 isravele, Nee Nandraayiruppadharkum, Un Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sonnabadi, Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththil Nee Migavum Viruththiyadaivadharkum, Avaigalukkuch Sevikoduththu, Avaigalinbadi Seyyach Saavadhaanamaayiru.
4 isravele, Kel: Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Oruvare Karththar.
5 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Un Muzhu Irudhayaththodum, Un Muzhu Aaththumaavodum, Un Muzhup Balaththodum Anbukooruvaayaaga.
6 indru Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugira Indha Vaarththaigalai Un Irudhayaththil Irukkakkadavadhu.

7 nee Avaigalai Un Pillaigalukkuk Karuththaaip Podhiththu, Nee Un Veettil Utkaarndhirukkirapodhum, Vazhiyil Nadakkirapodhum, Paduththukkollugirapodhum, Ezhundhirukkirapodhum Avaigalaik Kuriththup Pesi,
8 avaigalai Un Kaiyinmel Adaiyaalamaagak Kattikkolvaayaaga; Avaigal Un Kangalukku Naduve Gnaabagakkuriyaai Irukkakkadavadhu.
9 avaigalai Un Veettu Nilaigalilum, Un Vaasalgalilum Ezhudhuvaayaaga.

10 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Koduppen Endru Aabiragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Enbavargalaagiya Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittuk Koduththa Dhesaththil Unnaip Piravesikkappannumpodhum, Nee Kattaadha Vasadhiyaana Periya Pattanangalaiyum,

11 nee Nirappaadha Sagala Nalla Vasthukkalaalum Nirambiya Veedugalaiyum, Nee Vettaamal Vettappattirukkira Thuravugalaiyum, Nee Nadaadha Thiraatchaththottangalaiyum Olivaththoppugalaiyum, Avar Unakkuk Koduppadhinaal, Nee Saappittuth Thirupthiyaagumpodhum,
12 nee Adimaippattirundha Veedaagiya Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Unnaip Purappadappannina Karththarai Maravaadhabadikku Echcharikkaiyaayiru.
13 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhu, Avarukke Aaraadhanaiseydhu, Avarudaiya Naamaththaikkonde Aanaiyiduvaayaaga.

14 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Kobam Unmel Moondu, Unnaip Boomiyil Vaikkaamal Azhiththuppodaadhabadikku, Ungalaich Sutrilum Irukkira Janangalin Dhevargalaagiya Anniya Dhevargalaip Pinbatraadhiruppeergalaaga.
15 un Naduvilirukkira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Erichchalulla Dhevanaayirukkiraare.
16 neengal Maasaavile Seydhadhupola, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraip Pareetchai Paaraadhiruppeergalaaga.
17 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukkuk Karpiththa Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Avarudaiya Saatchigalaiyum Avarudaiya Kattalaigalaiyum Karuththaaik Kaikkolluveergalaaga.
18 nee Nandraayirukkiradharkum, Karththar Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittukkoduththa Nalla Dhesaththil Nee Piravesiththu, Adhaich Sudhandharippadharkum,
19 karththar Thaam Sonnabadi, Un Saththurukkalaiyellaam Un Mugaththirku Munbaagath Thuraththividuvadharkum, Nee Karththarudaiya Paarvaikkuch Semmaiyum Nanmaiyumaai Irukkiradhaich Seyvaayaaga.
20 naalaikku Un Puththiran: Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyitta Indhach Saatchigalum Kattalaigalum Niyaayangalum Enna Endru Unnidaththil Kettaal;
21 nee Un Puththiranai Nokki: Naangal Egipthile Paarvonukku Adimaigalaayirundhom; Karththar Balaththa Kaiyinaale Engalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaar.
22 karththar Engal Kankalukku Munpaaga, Egipthinmelum Paarvonmelum Avan Kudumbam Anaiththinmelum Kodidhaana Periya Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Vilangappanni,
23 thaam Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththukku Engalai Azhaiththukkondupoi, Adhai Namakkuk Kodukkumbadi Engalai Avvidaththilirundhu Purappadappanninaar.

24 innaalil Irukkiradhupola, Nammai Avar Uyirode Kaappadharkum, Ennaalum Nandraayirukkiradharkum, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhu Indha Ellaak Kattalaigalinbadiyeyum Seyyak Karththar Namakkuk Kattalaiyittaar.

25 nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Naam Avar Samugaththil Indha Ellaakkattalaigalinbadiyum Seyyach Saavadhaanamaayirundhaal, Namakku Needhiyaayirukkum Endru Solvaayaaga.
